### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE vendor_contracts ( 
    contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    vendor_name VARCHAR(255), 
    contract_amount DECIMAL(10, 2), 
    contract_date DATE 
); 


CREATE TABLE procurement_regulations ( 
    regulation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    regulation_name VARCHAR(255), 
    description TEXT, 
    regulation_date DATE 
); 


CREATE TABLE agreement_compliance ( 
    compliance_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
    contract_id UUID REFERENCES vendor_contracts(contract_id), 
    regulation_id UUID REFERENCES procurement_regulations(regulation_id), 
    compliance_status BOOLEAN 
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE vendor_contracts SET contract_amount = 15000.00 WHERE contract_id = '12345-67890-ABCDE'

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE VendorContracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_name VARCHAR(50),
    contract_value DECIMAL,
    contract_start_date DATE,
    contract_end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ContractsHistory (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    action_type VARCHAR(20),
    action_date DATE,
    action_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES VendorContracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ComplianceLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    log_date DATE,
    log_type VARCHAR(50),
    log_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES VendorContracts(contract_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProcurementRegulations (
    regulation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    regulation_title VARCHAR(100),
    regulation_description TEXT
);

### STATEMENT

UPDATE VendorContracts SET contract_value = 5000 WHERE contract_id = 1;
